pages.text: The world of Vesper features a huge collection of new weapons and armor to be found and crafted.$(br2)Each weapon has its own unique swing pattern so choose yours carefully.$(br2)Most of these new additions can be viewed by typing $(2)'@epicknightsmod'$() into JEI.
This is just one of the plethora of new weapons available.$(br2)For information on the new material tier, $(1)steel$(), see the Create page.
New flintlock weaponry adds an incredibly powerful, though costly and somewhat inaccurate, mid-game alternative to traditional bows and arrows.
However, bows haven't fallen behind.$(br2)A plethora of unique new ammunition is available that can be viewed by typing $(2)'@archer'$() into JEI.
